string.text: Minimum Time to Forget Witnessing Explosives Planting
Maximum Time to Forget Witnessing Explosives Planting
Minimum Distance To Trigger Proximity Explosives
Minimum Distance To Plant an Explosive on an NPC
Maximum Distance a Remote Explosive can be Triggered
Time Until a Timed Explosive Self-Detonates
Time Until a Proximity Explosive Can be Triggered
Short Option: Time Until a Pocket Timed Explosive Self-Detonates
Long Option: Time Until a Pocket Timed Explosive Self-Detonates
Planted proximity explosive with 5 second delay, armed with code %s
Planted timed explosive with %s second delay, armed with code %s
Planted pocket explosive armed with code %s
Remote explosive planted with frequency of
can be triggered by radio frequency of %s
What, you want me to carry this box for you? What's inside? None of my business? Fine, whatever, you're the boss here.
Seriously, you want me to carry explosives for you? I guess you are the leader here, but better not blow this up while i'm still holding it!
Hey boss, i'm not feeling great about carrying these explosives you've given me. Is this light supposed to be flashing red right now?
Another box to carry? This better not be heavy.
What, you want me to deliver this package? What's inside? Just some supplies? Fine, i will do it at some point, but i better get paid afterwards.
You are giving me a gift? Wow, so those good things people say about you must be true then. Thanks. I will open it once i get back to my storage locker.
What's this, an artifact in a special container? You want me to get this to the bunker? Sure, if they pay me for this, i will do it.
A gift? For me? Thanks... wait, why are there wires sticking out of the box? Uh, i think i'll pass.
Sorry, i can't hold any more things, my backpack is already full of stuff.
Sorry, pal, i don't accept boxes from strangers since that one time one of my squadmates got one and blew up.
You want me to deliver a package? Is the receiver going to pay me well for this? Yes? Whatever, give it here.
You are giving me a gift? I don't even know you, why should i take this? Fine, give it to me, i'm just gonna go and sell it to whoever wants it.
You want me to deliver an artifact to the bunker? But what if the container leaks radiation? Who are you callin' a wuss? Screw it, i will deliver this, but they better pay me well!
You want me to deliver a package? Who do i look like to you, a goddamn mailman? Piss off.
What's this? A gift? I don't even know you. Give that shit to someone else.
You want me to deliver an artifact to the bunker? Why don't you do it yourself? I don't want to deal with the radiation, if the container happens to be faulty.
What the hell is that? Oh shit, get this thing off of me!
Ah, shit, it's a bomb! Get it off, get it off!
Come on, how do i detach this crap?! Where do i cut?
Damn it, how do i pull this thing off?
What... are you doing..? No... please... not like this...
What the hell is this? Are you turning me into a bait now? Just shoot me in the head already!
Please don't make me die this way... I would rather get shot in the head...
You bastard... you will pay for this...
Can't plant pocket bombs while people are watching
Nobody alive without a bomb nearby
